name: VRPortfolio
description:
This is a test of Unreal Engines newest VR systems for Quest 2. I used a lot of my recent assets made in other classes to populate this world including:

NEWT!

Car project

Baked Lighting bar

JACK

Collos/Sword models

I also spent a good amount of time on the layered background elements to create the illusion of distance though I also made it cartoonish flat.

I would heavily recommend getting SideQuest as it will help sideload this project far easier.
